Thank you for your uploads HolyRoses. I was wondering if you could find it and do Hard Target (the Director's Cut) not the uncut or theatrical versions because those I found myself. I thought someone of your higher expertise would be able to find it and do a conversion to .mkv like the rest of your files. Thank you if you can. Thank you for just looking anyway.
oh and also the director's cut for Leon the Professional. Thanks.
